scripts.post-css: postcss public/bundle.css -o public/index.css --no-map && rm -rf public/bundle.css public/bundle.css.map public/index.css.map
scripts.build-sass: node-sass --include-path node_modules --include-path src src/index.scss public/bundle.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-css: npm run build-sass && npm run post-css
scripts.watch-sass: npm run build-sass && node-sass --include-path node_modules --include-path src src/index.scss public/bundle.css -w -r
scripts.start: npm run build-sass && npm-run-all --parallel watch-sass watch-css start-js
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
